Title: How to prove Fibonacci sequence with matrices?
Content:
How do you prove that:
$$
\begin{pmatrix}
1 & 1\\
1 & 0
\end{pmatrix}^n
= 
\begin{pmatrix}
F_{n+1} & F_n\\
F_{n} & F_{n-1}
\end{pmatrix}$$
